name: Derby Mayhem Car Racing
description:
Dodge the enemies and collect coins to unlock tons of cars. You can collect speed boost to smash enemy cars. But make sure you don’t get too damaged, or you’ll end up wasted so keep collecting health packs while racing. Keep eye on boss truck, it will come from nowhere to destroy your car. Just Tap or Swipe to make turns.

Features Derby Mayhem Car Racing

• Highly Addictive gameplay
• Tons of colorfull cars to unlock
• Simple controls just tap left right to drift
• Collect coins, boosts and health packs
• Catchy graphics
